sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zuìjìn chūchāi hěn pínfán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il voyage fréquemment pour le travail récemment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has been traveling frequently for work recently.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì chún shǒugōng zhìzuò de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est entièrement fait à la main.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is purely handmade.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā rè'ài yīnyuè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle aime passionnément la musique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She loves music passionately.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ quèdìng yào zhèyàng zuò ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Es-tu sûr de vouloir faire cela ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Are you sure you want to do this?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shēnqǐng le jīnglǐ de zhíwèi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a postulé pour le poste de directeur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He applied for the manager position.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de zhíwù shì xiāoshòu jīnglǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa fonction est directeur des ventes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His position is sales manager.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们周末去打羽毛球吧。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen zhōumò qù dǎ yǔmáoqiú ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons jouer au badminton ce week-end.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's play badminton this weekend.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 运动是我日常生活的一部分。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yùndòng shì wǒ rìcháng shēnghuó de yī bùfèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le sport fait partie de ma vie quotidienne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Exercise is part of my daily life.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā tízhe yī gè dà xiāngzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il porte une grande valise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is carrying a big suitcase.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhǔrén rèqíng de zhāodài kèren.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'hôte accueille chaleureusement les invités.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The host warmly entertains the guests.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他终于实现了自己的梦想。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhōngyú shíxiàn le zìjǐ de mèngxiǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a enfin réalisé son rêve.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He finally realized his dream.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gàosu wǒ nǐ shìfǒu tóngyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Dis-moi si tu es d'accord ou non.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please tell me whether you agree or not.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chāoshì lǐ yǒu gèzhǒng rìyòngpǐn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a toutes sortes d'articles de consommation courante au supermarché.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are all kinds of daily necessities in the supermarket.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng chūshì nín de shēnfènzhèng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez présenter votre carte d'identité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please show your ID card.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chúfáng lǐ yǒu yī zhī lǎoshǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a une souris dans la cuisine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a mouse in the kitchen.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā míngtiān yào zuò shǒushù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il doit subir une opération demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He will have surgery tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tǐxiàn le tā de nénglì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cela reflète ses capacités.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This reflects his ability.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā duì wèilái hěn lèguān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est optimiste quant à l'avenir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is optimistic about the future.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen qùnián líhūn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils ont divorcé l'année dernière.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They got divorced last year.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de jiāojì nénglì hěn qiáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a de fortes compétences sociales.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has strong social skills.
